page.title: 08Our housing survey.
page.content: There are different styles of houses in Seagry .The earliest was built in 1600 and the most recent in 1983. Most houses were built for farm workers.But three large houses were built for wealthy land owners. Seales Court was built in 1600.It was made of stone with stone mullions and fifty six windows.The original oak front door is still there.A stone dovecote is still there.Badgers Croft, built in 1897,used to be an old post office and before that a school. It is a red bricked cottage with slate roof, wooden windows and two chimneys and has a new extension built in 1985.
